name: SpotLightLogo
description:
Note : The HTML game might take a while to finish loading, use the downloadable version to save some time

This game is a submission to the GODOT WILD JAM with theme : SHADOWS

SpotLightLogo is a simple puzzle game which you have to align an object to a specific orientation , so that the casted shadow form a logo

Controls are simple : 
Rotate your object in all 3 axis using the following keys :
A-D
W-S
Q-E

The game was made using Godot Engine , Blender , Gimp . Huge thanks to the opensource communities behind these amazing software

Enjoy
Thanks for playing
